bella.name: Bella
bella.desc: Bella is a velvet-like fabric that's delightfully soft to the touch but designed to handle massive amounts of daily wear and tear. Its lustrous plushness gives it an upscale aesthetic, yet it's casual enough to be a perfect choice in both formal and informal settings.

catalina.name: Catalina
catalina.desc: Woven into a handsome herringbone pattern, this fabric gives the illusion of a woolen fabric but feels smooth and even to the touch. Catalina exudes superior class and sophistication with its rich texture and soft feel.

cosmo.name: Cosmo
cosmo.desc: Cosmo combines durability and elegance with a marbled tapestry look that's both sumptuous and welcoming. Made of 100% polyester fiber means it'll happily support hours of daily use. If you're enamoured by a clean finish and look this fabric is for you.

dawson.name: Dawson
dawson.desc: Dawson is a richly woven fabric with a subtle design and a soft yet sleek finish. The subtle layers of texture come from the tight weave of this fabric, giving it just enough natural variation to add interest.

derby.name: Derby
derby.desc: With two types of polyester yarn, Derby emulates the natural appeal and organic quality that is designed to ensure strength and durability to withstand an active family lifestyle. Absorbing color differently, the mix of fibers creates a tonal exploration of hue and dimension.

dillion.name: Dillion
dillion.desc: This charmingly natural leatherette with colorful hues provides a bold and dramatic finish. This leatherette has a soft natural grain that will show minimal distressing.

keylargo.name: Keylargo
keylargo.desc: Key Largo is a beautifully woven fabric that utilizes cationic yarn technology to create a unique contrasting color effect. The fabric is produced in environmentally friendly mills, and jet dyed to create exceptional color saturation and a highly polished look and feel.

malibu.name: Malibu
malibu.desc: Tonal colors twist together to create a tailored fabric reminiscent of traditional woolen menswear. Distinguished by its heathered appearance and softness, Malibu is no nonsense when it comes to being sturdy and durable.

marcy.name: Marcy
marcy.desc: This beautifully woven fabric oozes class and sophistication. With an enhanced design to ensure strength and durability to withstand an active family lifestyle.

notion.name: Notion
notion.desc: Notion fabric embodies a clean structure, and remains chic yet durable. The angular geometry of this weave is balanced by a clean yarn texture that offers an element of softness without giving up form.

oceanside.name: Oceanside
oceanside.desc: This luxurious tweed is a handsome woven fabric with a soft, supple texture. Its unique multi-tone effect brings extra dimension to any piece.

oscar.name: Oscar
oscar.desc: Oscar fabric uses a menswear-inspired twill weave to exude sophistication with multi-layered yarn that creates a heathered effect against a saturated color palette.

parker.name: Parker
parker.desc: Parker is a densely woven fabric with a refined sleek finish. It offers slight variations in color which adds subtle depth and texture. A great choice for homes with children or pets, this durable fabric is designed to handle whatever life throws at it.

pauline.name: Pauline
pauline.desc: Casual, and comfortable, Pauline is a beautifully woven fabric with a great choice for slipcovers. This tantalizing fabric is durable, and long-lasting, perfect for everyday family rooms.

phoenix.name: Phoenix
phoenix.desc: Phoenix is a tightly woven fabric with a soft hand, natural texture and subtle sheen. Featuring a remarkably resplendent finish, Phoenix with its woven look is the choice for everyday elegance.

sasha.name: Sasha
sasha.desc: Sasha provides a soft cozy feel while maintaining delicate sophistication. Flints of color variation lend unique movement and visual interest to this fabric, while also adding forgiving durability.

solifestyle.name: Solifestyle
solifestyle.desc: A textured, plush feel fabric with a distinct linear weft. SoLifestyle is a multifaceted fabric that offers a depth of texture, pattern and color. A unique crosshatch weave creates a pleasing geometry that is articulated by the spectrum of yarn colors.

sosoftness.name: Sosoftness
sosoftness.desc: A refined and tailored look is achieved with the muted hues and seamless weave of this high-performance fabric. Worn-in color and texture make this performance upholstery an edgy addition to the everyday home.

chance.name: Chance
chance.desc: With a dynamic multi-colored weave, Chance combines bold textured yarn with saturated colors. Its subtle variations ensure your furniture has a one of a kind look, suitable for any space, no matter your style.

naples.name: Naples
naples.desc: Woven into a prim and prestigious textured pattern, Naples creates the illusion of a woven fabric with the softness and durability of microfiber. Its high performing nature causes liquids to simply bead on the surface, meaning Naples can withstand almost any spill or pet that comes its way.

rocket.name: Rocket
rocket.desc: Rocket is one of our fine knit velvet-like introductions and retains a silk like hand feel. Its slight denim texturing provides a beautifully polished look that works well in both fun or elegant settings.

insight.name: Insight
insight.desc: A luxurious chenille like fabric that has the appearance of brushed velvet, this elegant fabric feels incredibly soft and cozy to the touch. Woven for exceptional durability to stand up to the demands of daily life.

lana.name: Lana
lana.desc: Woven with integrity, this fabric is a modern interpretation of texture and style, it's woven patterning and a softness of chenille gives Lana an ethereal effect.

urban_d.name: Urban D
urban_d.desc: A unique texture of organic linear grooves paired with a non-woven backing creates a deep and rich softness. Yes, this was in the last penthouse you stepped foot in.

dream_d.name: Dream D
dream_d.desc: Dream D offers the ultimate in classic velvet elegance style. We chose ours for its subtle sheen, soft hand and unique stain-resistant finish, for true livable luxury.

atlas_plz.name: Atlas PLZ
atlas_plz.desc: Atlas is a thickly woven yarn dyed chenille-like fabric offered in a variety of rich multi-colored tweeds. The texturing and natural variation of color in this textile adds durability.

malibu-1.name: Malibu
malibu-1.desc: Tonal colors twist together to create a tailored fabric reminiscent of traditional woolen menswear. Distinguished by its heathered appearance and softness, Malibu is no nonsense when it comes to being sturdy and durable.

redondo-1.name: Redondo
redondo-1.desc: Durable yet relaxed, this versatile fabric combines the appearance of soft canvas with strength and durability. Expertly woven Redondo is made to work well in both casual and traditional settings.

avenger.name: Avenger
avenger.desc: Avenger, with its unique basket weave look, offers both a pleasing texture, as well as natural variation throughout the multi color threads, for a fabric that's as one-of-a-kind as it is durable.

terrain.name: Terrain
terrain.desc: A tightly woven mini weave with a subtle texture that enhances each hue. Its thick woven nature offers dynamic tonal variation.

venus.name: Venus
venus.desc: Venus is a multicolored yarn that presents a wondrously woven texture, featuring an elegant subtle crushed texture.

prime.name: Prime
prime.desc: This textured, micro-denier chenille is the perfect upholstery fabric. With soft, rich, opulent colors, Prime brings any piece of furniture to life.

bungalow.name: Bungalow
bungalow.desc: Bungalow is a woven chenille-like fabric jet-dyed to offer unique color variation paired with a textured finish. The result is a striated effect that lends visual interest as well as durability to this fabric.

suave.name: Suave
suave.desc: Its multicolored yarn presents a wondrously woven texture, featuring an elegant shine across its subtly crushed texture.

avalon_hp.name: Avalon HP
avalon_hp.desc: Handsome woven fabric with a soft, velvety texture. Its multi-tone weave offers a beautiful dimension. Performance yarns make this fabric liquid repellent, fade resistant and easy to clean.

clyde.name: Clyde
clyde.desc: A casual weave with beautiful, tonal color variation and a blend of fibers that offers exceptional durability and Performance equipped to resist stains and spills.

curious.name: Curious
curious.desc: Delightfully soft to the touch, this beautiful fabric exudes luxurious flair, with a touch of modern glam. Its lustrous plushness gives it an upscale aesthetic, yet it's casual enough to be a perfect choice in both formal and informal settings.

durham.name: Durham
durham.desc: With a rich basket weave, our yarn-died Durham fabric offers a classic look with a modern twist. Subtle variations in color give the fabric depth, and the vibrant colors make the Durham fabrics pop.

elliot.name: Elliot
elliot.desc: Elliot is a densely woven fabric with a refined sleek finish. It offers slight variations in color which adds subtle depth and texture. A great choice for active homes, this durable fabric is designed to handle whatever life throws at it.

excellence.name: Excellence
excellence.desc: Excellence is a Plush woven fabric that is elegantly soft to the touch, and provides a fully saturated color. While slightly textured, these fabrics' subtle visible weave make them very durable and easy to clean.

glee.name: Glee
glee.desc: Stunning plush Velvet-like fabric that offers the ultimate in classic style. We chose ours for its subtle sheen, soft hand and unique stain-resistant finish, for true livable luxury.

hepburn.name: Hepburn
hepburn.desc: A beautiful fabric featuring a subtle crossdye technique offering multihued depth. This one checks all the boxes with its high abrasion rating and stain repellent finish.

hepburn_hrp.name: Hepburn HRP
hepburn_hrp.desc: A smooth, tight weave with subtle color variation and contrast. Offers exceptional durability and performance equipped to be liquid repellent and easy to spot clean.

jade.name: Jade
jade.desc: High Performance Velvet like fabric that offers a subtle sheen, soft hand, and strong durability profile. Elegantly crafted, it is resistant to crushing, pilling and is performance equipped to resist stains and spills.

leslie.name: Leslie
leslie.desc: This beautifuly contemporary texture is woven with a multi-layer of graceful charm, outlining the dynamic motif with a tailored and polished grace.

merit.name: Merit
merit.desc: Upscale to the eye and luxe to the hand, Merit features a woven look using soft chenille yarns. With its linen look pattern weave effect and contemporary hue, your piece is sure to exude a cozy yet sophisticated look.

merino_hrp.name: Merino HRP
merino_hrp.desc: With its luxe texture, Merino HRP is ready to bring your pieces to the next level. Featuring a woven chenille that's both elegant and effortlessly livable, this fabric is truly one that looks as good as it feels.

prisma.name: Prisma
prisma.desc: Prisma is our soft, heathered chenille which takes on a casual velvet appearance. It is a yarn dyed micro-denier polyester, which allows the yarn to blossom. It's softness doesn't take away from it's durability.

portland.name: Portland
portland.desc: Portland offers a chunky, yet lustrous chenille basket weave with a plush hand that makes cozying up on it hard to resist. Available in deep rich colors tones, the slight variance in the colored thread gives this fabric a unique and dimensional look.

simplex.name: Simplex
simplex.desc: Color, texture - what's not to love about the Simplex fabric family? This fabric showcases a cozy chunky basket weave, woven with white threads to give your piece a multi-faceted look.

sorrento.name: Sorrento
sorrento.desc: This Premium Suede's frustratingly photogenic semblance is smooth and warm to the touch, and maintains exceptional durability and cleanability. Always ready for a close-up.

quartz.name: Quartz
quartz.desc: Quartz is one of our fine knit velvet introductions with a silky smooth touch. It's fleece padded backing adds to the loft of the plush velvet it already is. Its neutral and jewel tone color offerings provide a beautifully polished look that works well in fun or elegant settings.

royale.name: Royale
royale.desc: Royale is one of our fine knit velvet introductions and is soft, smooth and gentle to the touch. It's fleece padded backing adds to the high quality of the plush velvet it already is. Its neutral and jewel tone color offerings provide a beautifully polished look that works well in fun or elegant settings.

r_lift.name: R Lift
r_lift.desc: Slight variations in its natural tone adds brightness to each shade. A beautifully soft, subtle twill, its varying yarn weights offer sumptuous depth, like a woven mosaic.

r_prize.name: R Prize
r_prize.desc: This beautifully woven fabric begs to be touched. Made of high-density fibers, Prize is woven with texture and tumbled for a soft finish and plush hand feel.

later.name: Later
later.desc: Buy Now, Decide Later. We'll hold production until you've picked your fabric and sizing. Click the add to cart button to proceed.

atlas.name: Atlas
atlas.desc: Woven with integrity, this fabric is a modern interpretation of texture and style. Its woven patterning and a softness of chenille give Atlas an ethereal effect.

avignon.name: Avignon
avignon.desc: An innovative printing technique gives the vibrant floral pattern on this fabric. This creates a vivid and soft watercolor painting. A woven pattern beautifully arranged in a relaxed yet durable look.

bergamo.name: Bergamo
bergamo.desc: This beautifully woven floral-inspired fabric begs to be touched. Made of high-density fibers, Bergamo is woven with texture and tumbled for a soft finish and plush hand feel.

blanche.name: Blanche
blanche.desc: Blanche Leatherette combines a beautiful natural leather look with unexpected color saturation to provide a bold yet elegant finish. This durable leatherette has a soft natural grain that will show minimal distressing, akin to a well-worn pair of equestrian chaps.

bodhi.name: Bodhi
bodhi.desc: This elegant contemporary look of formal wear with crisply defined stripes also has a colorful palette. Woven of sturdy fibers by master craftsmen, this versatile fabric can live in traditional and modern interiors alike.

ford.name: Ford
ford.desc: This beautifully rich leatherette with its well-worn finish is distinguished, while being slightly distressed. This durable leatherette has a soft natural grain that will show slight distressing.

geo.name: Geo
geo.desc: Woven into a prim and prestigious herringbone pattern, Geo gives the illusion of a woolen fabric with the softness and durability of microfiber. Its high-performing nature causes liquids to simply bead on the surface, meaning Geo can withstand almost any spill or pet that comes its way.

hathaway.name: Hathaway
hathaway.desc: Beautifully dynamic Leatherette, Hathaway combines a naturally soft leather look with unexpected colorful hues to provide a bold yet elegant finish. This leatherette has a soft natural grain that will show minimal distressing.

merci.name: Merci
merci.desc: This contemporary geometric print is woven with an additional layer of charm, outlining the dynamic motif with a bit of texture and an appliquÃ©d look.

noble.name: Noble
noble.desc: Velvet-like fabric that offers the ultimate in classic style. We chose ours for its subtle sheen, soft hand and unique stain-resistant finish, for true livable luxury.

oakley.name: Oakley
oakley.desc: Oakley is one of our fine knit velvet-like introductions and has a silk-like hand. Its slight denim texturing provides a beautifully polished look that works well in both fun and elegant settings.

redondo.name: Redondo
redondo.desc: Durable yet relaxed, this versatile fabric combines the appearance of soft canvas with strength and durability. Expertly woven Redondo is made to work well in both casual and traditional settings.

tess.name: Tess
tess.desc: With a rich basket weave, our yarn-died Tess fabric offers a classic look with a modern twist. Subtle variations in color give the fabric depth, and the vibrant colors make the Tess fabrics pop.

venice.name: Venice
venice.desc: A luxurious chenille that has the appearance of brushed velvet, this synthetic fabric feels incredibly soft and cozy to the touch. Woven for exceptional durability to stand up to the demands of daily life.

zambia.name: Zambia
zambia.desc: Delightfully soft to the touch, this print exudes luxurious flair, with a touch of modern glam. Its lustrous plushness gives it an upscale aesthetic, yet itâ€™s casual enough to be a perfect choice in both formal and informal settings.
